results.title: Metformin toxicity: A meta-summary of case reports
results.text_hl: Most of the reported cases were on therapeutic doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ but developed @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ after an acute @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@deterioration in renal functions@@@.

citations.NLM: Juneja D, Nasa P, Jain R. Metformin toxicity: A meta-summary of case reports World J Diabetes. 2022 Aug 15;13(8):654-664. PMID: 36159225

results.title: Diabetes, Metformin and the Clinical Course of Covid-19: Outcomes, Mechanisms and Suggestions on the Therapeutic Use of Metformin
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@Acute renal failure@@@ is a contraindication that requires discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as discussed later.

results.title: Metformin potentiates nephrotoxicity by promoting NETosis in response to renal ferroptosis
results.text_hl: However, the activity of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@ is still incompletely understood.
